item.title: Getting Started: Basics of Git
item.description: Git is operated from the commadline. To get started make sure you have installed git. Initializing Git To get started initializing git, you need to run: git init Git Workflow Make change to a file. Prepare to share the changes. Share the changes. 1. Selecting a File to Share To share a file, first you need to select a file you want to share. To do this use the command:

item.title: Basic CLI Commands You Should Know
item.description: Creating a file using commandline You can create a new file using the commandline touch file_name.txt Display contents of a file You can also display the content of a file with the cat command. To use the cat command type: cat filename_txt Creating a directory You can create a new folder using a command as well. A folder is also called a directory. To create a directory, use the mkdir command:
